item.title: Android Basics
item.description: Config Android Virtual Device (AVD) manager : Used to create an emulator. You will find it in Tools > AVD Manager Layouts TextView Each of the elements on screen is called View The Views in an Android app don’t just float on the screen by themselves. Views have relationships to each other. For example, an image may be next to some text, and buttons may form a row.
